description: This file defines a FastAPI dependency function to retrieve the current authenticated user based on JWT token provided via HTTP Bearer authorization. It handles token decoding, validation, UUID extraction, and user retrieval from the database.

methods.name: User get_current_user( creds: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials | None = Depends(security_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: A FastAPI dependency function that authenticates and retrieves the current user based on the Bearer JWT token.

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.signature: ( creds: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials | None = Depends(security_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
